Title: Relates to the use of telematics systems by automobile insurers
Summary: Requires certain disclosures by automobile insurers relating to the use of telematics systems in determining insurance rates and/or discounts.
LawCode: Amd ยง2313, add ยง2304-a, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to the use of telematics systems by insurers
